text: The management team need to train the employee better how to read the computer screen staff are not friendly parking lot is dirty.
Round 2. Still nobody answers the drive through or phone. I walked inside per usual and guy makes me a cold sandwich. I love this shit.

The young man Devante does not know how to take orders. He is extremely rude was smiling the entire time when I was trying to figure out with the young girl what was happening and had nothing but a snarky attitude I am calling the managers later and corporate. No one was behind me so it's not like they were busy. Disgusting.

0 stars. You wait in the drive through for nobody to answer, you call the number and nobody answers, you drive up and call the number in the window and nobody answers, you finally walk inside and these pieces of shit are all sitting on their phones lol. Insane.
First they left food out of the drive thru order and had an attitude when I went in to get it. I got home and they put a small soda cup in a large cup instead of filling the large cup.

I live in the area and have gone to this McDonald's for years. I love McDonald's so I keep coming back but if you go you should expect your order to be messed up. More often then not the order is just flat out wrong or missing items. And I'm fact there isn't a time in the last year that I can remember they got the order right. If you want McDonald's and your in the area do yourself a favor and go to a different location.

I sometimes door dash in my spare time and I went to this location before to pick up some food the drive thru line was super long so I parked and walked in the store (the lobby door was unlocked) soon as I walk in I'm bombarded with question "what you doin in here?" "How you get in here" "you know the lobby closed huh" I answer, I'm picking up a order for doordash, the door was unlocked, no I didn't know the lobby was closed cause the door is unlocked" once I get through the McDonald's interrogation I ask the lady who's talking to me if she can hand me the food because it's sitting right there on the counter and she started to hand it to me then all of a sudden the manager comes all the way from the office to snatch the bag out of my hand and tells me I need to go through the drive thru. But sir... I've already touched the food so whatever it is you're trying to do to abide by safety protocols is already out the window. Long story short instead of arguing with this man I go back outside get in the drive thru line and wait a extra 15 minutes to pick up a order that was already in my hands. I avoid this McDonald's as much as I can. Since I've been in New Orleans the last five years this is hands down the rudest McDonald's out here.

Every time you go to this McDonald's it's always a problem. The black lady at the first window did not ring up everything I asked for. When I got to the second window to let them know that. It seems like she was mad at me because they didn't get my order right. Ask to speak to the manager and she was even worst than the cashier. And to make things worst. She closed the window on me and walked off. The sad thing about this is , No matter how many bad reviews we write or how many calls we make. McDonald's will never do anything about their bad customer service and hold their people accountable for their actions.  I guess when customers stop spending their money here maybe it will be a wake up call for the employer and employees. The worst location ever! Just read the other reviews. I wish I could give them no stars.

first off there's a whole family that works at that particular McDonald's. I'm pretty sure that family isn't supposed to work with family. That's a conflict of interest! Some are managers and some are regular staff. They are a bunch of miserable, unhappy people. They are very rude and unprofessional. As a paying customer i should not have to wait for someone to help me when I plainly see 4 managers just standing at the front desk. They don't acknowledge customers and when they do help they have an attitude. Not to mention I witnessed a manager talking down to a staff member! I don't know how they still have a job and how the hire ups think it's ok to run a restaurant  in that manner! The energy they give off there is so depressing! These sort of people are not made for the customer service industry. They must have a pretty unhappy life at home! As the saying goes, misery needs company! After reading other reviews I'm glad to know I'm not the only one that feels this way. But the funny thing is, it's still going on! They definitely lost my business!

The worst McDonalds I have ever been to. There are regularly groups of gang members hanging out inside and negotiating drug deals (even though it is "closed" for eat in). The employees have bad attitudes and always get orders wrong. The place has trash strewn on the floor. A discredit to the franchise.

Not a good place to go to if you want to be ripped off. we have attended this place a few times in december and january this year more than usual but over the period of 1.5 years isnt still a good place to go to. Now medowie macdonalds is open i would drive that little bit extra to go there and get a good meal and get what you ordered with a smile. We have had missing drinks, missing hash browns, missing icecreams, ive had to keep telling the young girl this and that is missing after the 3rd time she got pissy at me for it... always waiting bayed and they delete your order and they dont give you what they want because they want their monthly bonuses rather happy returning customers.

Worst McDonald's ever. Every time we get stuff from here it's either messed up or they forget stuff. This trip they almost didn't even give us all our food. My husband had to tell them they forgot our food. Didn't even give the toys they're supposed to be giving. We got Pokémon stuff. We were expecting Sing 2 or Encanto toys.  My daughter's cheeseburger in her happy meal had onions on it. Never once in all the times we've gotten a cheeseburger happy meal has there been onions on the burgers. And they didn't even give us her juice with her happy meal. Seriously if I could give 0 stars I would!!
Burnt fries and nuggets every time. Employees barely acknowledge your existence. Avoid this location.

Worst place in town.  Order on the app, show up at 930.  Closed.  They just shut down at any random hours.  When they are "open", expect 5o wait a min of 30 minutes if there's 2 or more cars in the drive through.  Oh yeah, they shut down walk in for over a year.  Update your hours people.  Stop wasting everybody's time.

This McDonald's and the other one nearby on City Ave are now regularly closing to people and only serving DoorDash and UberEats. Don't waste your time driving here just to be told that they won't serve you. You can read more about their new deal in this article: https://restaurantbusinessonline.com/financing/mcdonalds-announces-new-deals-doordash-uber-eats

This McDonald's and the other one nearby on City Ave are now regularly closing to people and only serving DoorDash and UberEats. Don't waste your time driving here just to be told that they won't serve you. You can read more about their new deal in this article: https://restaurantbusinessonline.com/financing/mcdonalds-announces-new-deals-doordash-uber-eats

Every time I order from here I'm missing something in my order. It's covid you put stickers on the bag so the dashers can't even check the order to make sure everything's in there. At least have the common courtesy to do your job and check yourself. I missing some nuggets. 1 time I got 2 slushees that I didn't even order and no meal. This is stupid get it together.

The worst McDonalds ever!I walked into lobby got half way to counter a woman informed me the lobby is closed.I asked why ?Talked to the manager she said we are closed and called me a cracker under her breath.REALLY???I wouldn't go thru drive through I was afraid they would spit in my food and I assure you I am always polite!!!

I asked to add lettuce and tomato to my cheeseburgers, and literally got 1 tiny tomato and like 5 pieces of lettuce on each.....they charged me an extra $.80 total for all of that, and I def got ripped off.
Ese Mc Donal los empleados no atienden los clientes bien y cuando sirven lo hacen incorrecto y siempre están jodiendo poca atención le doy un o
Please cook the red out of your burgers. I ate it half raw because I was starved. But come on guys. And please for godsake fill your drinks up. We're getting them filled 2/3 lately.

This is by far the worst McDonald's I have ever been to. The manager is too lazy to even light up the sign out front. I once went in and waited 40 minutes for a 1/4 Pounder with cheese. Twice I have gone through the drive through and found that my hamburger didn't have any ketchup or mustard on it. McDonald's can be a decent place to eat if managed right. This manager needs to be fired.
Drive-through on us Friday night, 20 minutes waiting to get to the window. Slowest drive through for any McDonald's!  This is ridiculous!!
The Ronald McDonald house is kicking children out if they have UNvaccinated family members...they are involved in child rape

ive been to this mcdonalds multiple times and this last time was the final straw. one time they forgot multiple items and then proceeded to tell me that i was incorrect. then never giving me my receipt they had to double check it on their end, which infact they were incorrect. today i ordered a large meal and they gave me a medium, but the girl in the window never gave me a receipt. i shouldnt have to ask for it everyrtime! and they should not be getting some little item messed up EVERYTIME i order. i also got rootbeer but they gave me a sweet tea. i would stay away from this mcdonalds and just go down the road to burger king, arbys, or the chickfila

Night shift looks to be leaving the outdoor lights off some nights. Came at 830 pm tonight. Sign on the drive through saying cash only this time. So I didn't even ask about the shake machine. Had to ask if someone was there twice with no response. I was persistent and I would not be deterred of enjoying my beloved Micky Ds. On the third attempt after two minutes waiting someone greeted me. I was basically shouting at a speaker In the dark like a mentally ill person. There was no one in line and no customers in the store. Seemed they didn't want to be bothered. I attempted a friendly exchange while the girl who counted my change but she did not speak. I think the words she uttered were "uh huh" It was extremely hard to understand her, sounded like she was chewing on something and underwater at the same time. It also seemed she didn't like the idea of other human lives being in her presence. Felt very unwell and unwelcome. She also looked extremely unwell.... 
The store resembled a dark place, almost like a dark hole that sucks planets into it, never to return. That goes for the lighting and the customer service energy.

Dude at the second window was cool like " yo bro what's up , have a good night" 
I said "you too bro. " 
... that part felt uplifting so I am thankful for that.

Sandwich was straight, the patties were hot. 
Keep the kitchen, gut the rest. There is a virus in there that needs removal.

I would give 0 stars if I could. I made a mobile order. I decided to go into the store and check on my order after waiting 12 minutes in the designated parking spot. The cashier looks in the system and said "We don't have your order". I pull up the app and confirm that I made an order, showed my receipt to the cashier. She gets a manager, Karina. The manager looks in the computer and says "we don't have your order". I preceded to show her my order on the mobile app. She walks away. I wait thinking she's fulfilling my order. Nope, she just walked away. So ask the cashier to get the manager back. The manager proceeds to tell me there is nothing they can do if the order isn't in their system. She can't be sure via the mobile app that I paid. I proceed to show her the email confirmation which has my credit card information, the authorization code and amount paid. She continues to say there is nothing she can do. Mobile ordering is different from McDonald's. Even though it was the McDonald's app that I used! When money is taken and services or products are not received that is by definition STEALING! I'm currently waiting on corporate to refund my monies. I will never go to this establishment again.

The absolute worst!, started taking my order then stopped, took someone else's order then decided to finally take my order over Again!!  Waited almost 15 minutes, finally got my food but no drink! Another 5 minutes to ask me what I'm waiting for, I told them my drink then they blew me off!!  This was around 10:30 at night!  The absolute worst!!!

This location has steadily gone from bad to worse. When I got there, the drive-thru was 3 cars deep at the oder board even though the drive-thru lane itself was empty. So, I decided to go inside the restaurant; the lobby was empty save for one person waiting for his order.  I placed my order: 2 Quarter-pounders, 3 apple pies, a 6-pcs nugget, 1 large french fries and a Strawberry-Banana smoothie. I knew I was going to wait a few minutes but more than half an hour later and after everyone who'd come in after me had already left. I finally asked about my order. It was hastily put together. I had let the lady know I was missing the smoothie (but not her fault, she just started her shift and was the only person expediting orders). The "manager" was hanging around in the parking lot. After I arrived home with my order, I realized they also missed giving me my nuggets and the food was lukewarm, almost cold. NEVER AGAIN! I'm not wasting my hard-earned money ever again at a McDonald's.
They're improving. The young man on drive through (2pm on Wednesday) is EXCELLENT.  Smart, personable young man.   Making a big difference!

if i could give ---- star rating i would!!! absolutely do not doordash this location! lobby is always closed and they have the slowest staff known to man kind at the drive thru! fix your stupid store!

This mcdonald's owes me $5.49 I ordered a mobile order, sat in a curbside spot for 40 minutes and then went through the drive through and was told they never got my order even though I showed them my receipt that had been emailed to me they rolled their eyes and said they aren't giving me it. I expect the owner to be contacting me. Absolute bull shit.

I am so disappointed!!!!! I love and cherish the Buffalo sauce from McDonald's and did not receive ANY!!!! I placed an order through the mobile app asking for 2 sauces and I get none!!! Save your money and go somewhere else!!

If I could give less than a star I would, week day staff is awful, they are in such a rush they don't get the order right, and if it's right and your at the drive thru, by the time you pay it's wrong, or when you go to pick up order it's wrong, I've been 5x and all 5x my order was wrong, I'm gonna drive to Dickerson Rd, it might me further but my order is always correct and the food is hot and fresh!!!!!

Just order a large coffee through the mobile app waited 10 minutes and employee came outside and told me that they did not have the large was a medium fine I agreed to say yes waited another 10 minutes still no coffee.. I left
I purposely use the mobile app to skip the line that didn't work and you guys made me late for work

Tonight at 11:30 the manager threatened to call the police on me because she refused to honor their apple pie deal.  The sign at the drive through still says that if they forget to ask you about MyMcDonalds Rewards, you get a free apple pie.  The young lady at the drive through didn't ask about the rewards program, so I asked for the apple pie.  The angry night manager yelled through the window to me, claiming that they had quit that deal a month ago, and that I could just sit in the drive through until she "call da police, 'cuz he ain't getting' no apple pie."  
If that's so, then why have they served me the free apple pie twice in just this last week when they've forgotten to ask me each time?  And why does their drive through sign still say they have that deal if they don't?
What a nasty, bitter manager lady.  I should patronize the Wendy's, Culver's, Chick-fil-a, or other places right up the street whether the management is more polite.
Never received my food from DoorDash I didn't know who to contact about getting my order

LOL THANKS MCDONALD'S FOR JUST EGG MCGRIDDLES YOU PETTY ASSES  this is by far the worse mcdonald's i've ever been to, not the first time they've done this shit. (and my bf got this he never checks the bags like a dummy lol)

Just came home from work and stopped to pick up 4 McDoubles  (at about 1:30am) priced at $1.39 each.  I was charged $9.37.  They had no change  (imagine that) available for the $10 total that I gave the young lady.  I asked if the price had gone up, she said yes.  Knowing otherwise I chose not to belabor the point and figured that if she needed the +$3 bad enough to lie and steal for it - She can have it.  Watch out Everyone!.  I'll never patronize that particular restaurant again.  I might as well be held up!

I arrived at this store at 10:30 pm and waited for 1 hour. Also, The staff is so rude and the management system is not complete. They lost my online order but didn't go back to check. The food is as bad as the staff. Even though I waited for an hour, you can't get the satisfying food. Don't waste money in this store. Finally, Do not come this store!!!!
I have been sitting/stuck in this drive thru for over an hour and a half. This place is an absolute joke. Ridiculous.
Burgers still mooing. You guys have a bunch of dumb asses working in there, how are you guys still open?

This McDonald's is easily the worst location in the greater St. Louis area. I only go here because it's less than 3 minutes away from home and my picky kids love their scrambled eggs.
They always require us to repeat our order multiple times. Despite that, more often than not, there is a mistake (wrong drink, missing item, etc.).
And worst of all is the attitude of the employees. They are consistently rude, blaming customers for their mistakes, scolding people for not waiting longer at a vacant window, or simply having a "please go away" demeanor.
Additionally, calls to feedback number posted (314-270-4901) seem to fall on deaf ears as nothing has changed over the last 3 years. And given how long this has been an issue, this is clearly not a consequence of the pandemic.

Location has finally Jeff saying that the dining room is open but they have the doors locked when I tried to go in they claimed that the dining room close but they had people inside eating so she refused to open the door even though the sign says the dining room is open the young lady who claimed to be a manager was very rude and nasty and told me to go somewhere else if I didn't want to go through the drive-through when I asked her what her name was she refused to give me mine her name the best way to describe her is she was a short Caucasian woman with right now teeth I have gone to this location on several occasions and nothing is ever corrected the communication is very poor because no one speaks English
I know it's just McDonalds but this is the second time I've been in there, got a large fry and they gave me like 10 fries. At least fill the container
They get my order wrong 90% of the time and they always seem grouchy and irritated that your making them work

Went to the drive-thru and sat there for 30 minutes. One of the cars honked just to see what was going on and then finally a worker spoke in the intercom screaming "honking won't get you your food any faster". Both windows had 2 people working and I am sure 2 more in the kitchen. They charge extra for sauces...I got a large fries and it was literally the size of a small. Very poor service!
Awful service. Rarely get the our order right. And I don't think they care either. ..

This may be one of the worst McDonalds I have ever been to. Surprising given it's in a relatively upscale neighnorhood. Dirty, long lines, understaffed, and a comedy of errors in fulfilling orders if numerous custoners around me. No surprise that that so many previous reviews echo my impression!

The breakfast sandwiches were hard, like it was sitting for a long time. The hash browns were over fried. The coffee was the worst part. Usually McDonalds' McCafe coffee is good, but this morning the coffee was super watered down and pretty gross. A very disappointing breakfast at this location.

I'm giving this a 2 because of the rude service in the drive thru from the person taking our order. The person taking our money and the person giving us our food we very nice and friendly and the food was great. I asked both people who took my order and they said Ms Stephanie- the manager. If she is the example setter and Superviser for this store that's sad. I normally don't leave bad reviews, but she needs more education in customer service and people skills. Very RUDE. We travel nationwide and usually eat 3 meals a day at Restaurants and fast food when we are out of town this I can honestly say is the worse experience I've had in a long time. I feel sorry for the people who have to work with her if she is this rude to her customers.
i see why the pretty woman with the red hair jacked u guys up on that you tube video lol
I don't whats going on here lately, but orders are wrong and we're getting charged for it.

No wonder this location is looking for help. I have not been to this McDonald's since pre-Covid. I attempted to go in to place my order and the door was locked. I'm like OK, I got back in the car and went through the drive-thru. BIG mistake. I spent almost $39.00 for dinner, and they screwed me out of 1 Quarter Pounder and the food was STONE cold. I only live 6 miles from the store, and I drove fast to get the food back to my elderly parents. Absolutely pathetic and I will not be back anytime soon. No wonder that I prefer BK instead.

Waited easily 10+ minutes for food as they were busy. Usually a busy restaurant serves hot food. Not this one. Our two burgers were barely warm and the fries stone cold and way overly salty to the point I was feeling nauseous from the salt. 

Also the receipt had a web address and code to rate them but there was no such web address. If I could give less than 1 star I would.

Where do I start. Maybe the most rude and loud employees in all of gallatin. They talk over your order. I got 2 sauces for a 20 piece nugget and they told me I was rude for asking for more. I wouldn't eat at this location again if my life depended on it. Shameful

As always, I might as will just throw my money out the window while I'm driving there. You can ask for fresh fries and they still don't give them to you. This place frustrates me so much. Try to avoid this place at all cause.

Worst Big Mac I've ever had. The patties were tiny and dry.  They looked like Playdoh (and tasted about as good). Very little sauce. Two little shreds of lettuce.  I get a Big Mac once a year as a treat and this was just an appalling experience.
Drive thru crew was hiding when we tried to go this morning so we left! Very disappointed!

I couldn't get the cashiers name but there is an older lady who runs the drive that does not know how to multitask, very rude to customers, never gets our orders rights because she is distracted by the person paying at the window! She definitely needs fired!!!
This McDonald's  never gets a order correct. Every time I order with them thru uber eats its completely wrong. Horrible staff, very low skilled, very incompetent. It's quite sad honestly.

I don't normally stop into McDonald's but decided I would today to get the apps .99 cent iced coffee! I even add on a sandwich too. I did a mobile order thinking it would be faster and easier as I have work this morning. I was pulled all the way through window 3 outside. I waited for 15 minutes at this window as cars outside kept passing me. Finally someone came to the window and said her computer crashed - no biggie. Showed her my phone that I paid. Then she came back and asked me to pay more than what I was supposed to pay via the app. Then some other woman came and told me I had to pay more and that the app crashed - even though I was charged. And kept saying the man said you need to pay. So I told her to cancel my order and left. On to bigger and better things like Wendy's or Starbucks for morning coffee (:

Long story short... my friend and I were being followed and almost kidnapped. We banged on the windows crying for help and they would not let us in. Luckily a cop was on the street next to us, just for extra info we are from a different state not knowing where to run. God was with us and a cop was right there, luckily the cop pulled over to help us. Covid protocols should never be an excuse for someone's life. Absolutely ridiculous. Even spoke to the manager, and he gave that excuse.
This is the slowest worst McDonald's I've ever been too, got here at 1030 and didn't get food until 1140
I have lived here for 2 years. This McDonald's never has the ice cream machine up and working.

They always mess up my order and when I finally decided to say some thing and ask for the manager, the manager Rose came up to the window and said OMG you Mexicans and blacks always do this. I was in shock and couldn't believe my ears. Before the situation can escalate I just left. I told my son and his friends about what happened and they informed me that the manager also sells acid and other illegal substance to the kids that work there. I will not be going there again and will be calling corporate.

The last 5 times I have driven through they have messed up my order. I ask for Diet Coke and I get regular. I ask for UNsweet tea and get sweet. Every time. They talk over me when I'm still ordering. The last time I got to the window and confirmed that it was diet. I was told yes- it was not. In the same order they left out a hash brown. I've have thrown out more drinks than I have kept. I won't go back. So disappointing. My orders aren't that difficult. It's just me and mostly a Diet Coke and chicken biscuit. When I ordered the bundle and a diet, I got just the biscuit, no hash brown and regular Coke.

I was handed a coke with the lid half on out the drive through window.   The lid was crushed so I requested a new lid.  The nasty girl stared at me in disgust as I jiggled two kids and a coke, trying not to spill it on myself.  I ordered a hot fudge sundae with extra fudge on the bottom.  I was charged extra for just enough fudge to make some color on the bottom and very little fudge on the top.  It wasn't fudge consistency.  It was more like chocolate sauce.  The ice cream was skimpy and tasted watered down.  
Go to a different location.  Something is amiss here
My husband went to buy my kids food and we get home and there's no nuggets in the happy meal box how does that even happen? We tried to call and they don't answer the phone.

This is THE worst McDonald's that I have ever been to! The lines are ridiculously long and when you finally receive your order the food is cold? Cold soggy fries with a dry, salty burger!!?? If I ever go there again, it will be out of desperation or no other options.

If I could give a Zero I certainly would. I received the wrong order. Although I ordered on the app, the correct order was confirmed at window 1 as well as at the speaker. I get all the way to work and reached in my bag and out comes a hard bacon egg and cheese sandwich and an equally hard sausage egg and cheese mcmuffin. So I was like well at least they got my drink right. WRONG! I ordered a small hot caramel macchiato and a sausage egg and cheese McGriddle receipt 1394. The coffee tasted like grounded dirt. I immediately called to inform them that I had the wrong order and that something was wrong with the machine. The woman that answered. Acknowledged that it was McDonald's then hung up. When I spend my hard earned money I don't expect anything but positive attitudes and understanding when something is wrong. The owner of this McDonalds has a slew of hell whole locations and they all seem to be ran the same. Cash cow with low grade employees. AT THIS POINT I JUST WANT MY MONEY BACK AND I WANT NOTHING ELSE TO DO WITH ANY OF HIS LOCATIONS.

There has been multiple times I've come here and I've had the workers say they are closed when they lights are on and workers are clearly here. Now they are clearly they are taking their time. They should find some workers that actually want to work.

Hi, I just we t in there a few minutes ago thru drive thru and I ordered fries, 6 pc nugget and a crust chicken sandwich and when I got home I saw that the nuggets were cold and hard and the chicken sandwich was also hard and cold!!! I'm highly pissed that I wasted 13 bucks on this food and got cold and hard food

Shitty Service equals Shitty Food! This McDonald's should be shut down and the building should be demolished so they can put a real fast food restaurant with Excellent Service like In/Out Or right about now, A Burger King.   As a matter of fact, McDonald's should send a request for In/Outs handbook on how to serve people, treat people and serve Hot Fresh Food. The overpriced cold French Fries. WTF!  If the entire service starts like Shit, then the entire thing is Shit.  Seriously, this location needs to revamp the entire staff since the management doesn't recognize how bad this shithole really is. I literally live 1 freaking mile away and can't place a order and get home in 5 minutes and eat cold burgers, nuggets or Fries. People want better pay, but can't give better service. Fuck this place and the lame ass employees that work there. Not sorry about how I worded this review as they just can't do or get shit right. Standards have definitely dropped. Not worthy of even One Star.

We waited in line for 10 minutes. It was about 10:45 when we got there. As soon as we got to the ordering box she said they were closed. Even though on literally everything else including the business hours posted said they don't close until midnight on the weekends. Even if they were closed they should have at least taken the orders of the people already in line. This place is a joke and this isn't the first time stuff like this has happened. Waste your money at a different mcdonald's. I wouldn't even give this place 1 star.
At 51 years old, this McDonald's holds my personal record for worst yet. Unbelievably slow. Orders wrong literally 100% of the time. Never stop there unless you just hate yourself.
I placed an order via the app I waited for over 40 minutes and never received my food but I was charged for the order

No indoor seating and rude as heck. Minimum staffing for profit and food has been more incorrect than ever. This is for the one on pyramid in front of bully's. Had to go there because Taco Bell's computers were down last month against my better judgment and same old garbage with incorrect delivery. I'll eat a peanut butter sandwich next time because that's going to taste way better.

This place has been trash for years now! You wait in drive thru forever and when you get your food the fries taste like they was cooked before you ever got in drive thru and say there for half hour or longer! Management must think fries are expensive and to never throw them out properly! 
And today they let me and a gang of other cars sit in drive thru for 20-30minutes before opening up they side door and yelling out  they are closed till 11. Too lazy to make a sign on the drive thru board???? Mobile ordering is still working and still allowed to! So y'all just wasted half hour of a dozen people's lives for nothing but your laziness to make a sign or tell people thru the headset you wasnt open..... or to say on the app that you was closed! Just like last week when I ordered apple slices for my daughter and you tried to give me some mushy ass apple micro bite size oatmeal apples without even telling me!
Service is very slow. They got my older are mixed up, kept trying to give me someone else's.

Worst service and rudest people. I worked at McDonald's for years and it is appalling to see how awful this store is managed. I waited 20 minutes before anyone even acknowledged me in the store. The drive-thru is consistently too long. This location should permanently shut down.

They literally hide from customers after like 8pm. Everytime recently. Also, every burger bun for the past 6 ish months have been extremely stale when They aren't hiding. The frys here are also always so cold gross EVERYTIME I don't suggest going to this location. Worst on this side of town.

closed @ 7pm on New Years Eve...

if you can't find staff, at least update your hours!!

Got in the drive thru at 4:50 PM thinking I could get home by 6 with no problem. When I finally got to the second window 50 minutes later, they gave us our drinks and told us to wait in the parking lot with 3 other people ahead of us. No one got their food and I paid ten bucks for two watered down sodas. I'd rather eat dog food than at this place
This is the slowest McDonald's I've ever been at. Every single time.  They don't even have dine in service right now and they are still insanely slow.

Wow. The world is such that you have to kiss the order  taker at McDonalds ass just to order your food. Ordered a number 2 and also chicken nuggets. They asked what's sauces? I said honey mustard and sweet and sour. They said no! You get one. You'll pay for the extra. Okay...then I'll pay'... I paid and waited. The window was opened and my food was handed to me and window slammed shut. 

Slam the damn window then! Im still here because I'm waiting for my drink. Not because I enjoy you... or your pleasant to look at or friendly. 

No one needs anything special. Please give the order..in its entirety..through the window. That's all. You dont get a fucking award for working! I wasn't mean to you. I'm so sorry your life is so hard  that you have to hold a job. 

Are fast food restaurants struggling? Yes because some employees are so fucking rude that regular folks that are friendly and patient cant even be treated like humans. No I'm no longer friendly. I just want a burger. 

Since when did you have to have a repor at the drive through? 

It's like going to the DMV you have to kiss ass to get anything. People just want a burger. That's it!  It's a burger!  

Why is getting fast food so difficult these days? 

Haha! I just want to swing through McDonalds! Why is it a psychological puzzle. It's a fucking fast food burger! Shouldn't be so incredibly hard.

How can a 24hr restaurant be shut down numerous times through out the night? The restaurant is a 24hr one, there are no notices posted of the closure. Im not one to normally complain but when McDonald's consistently repeats their shutdowns makes me want to find out why the shutdown. I will be reaching out to corporate to further my complaint, until I am satisfied with a good reason why a 24hr restaurant keeps shutting down.

Every single worker in there when I went tonight deserves to be fired. For some reason they weren't doing the drive thru at 10pm, only "online pickup and delivery". So we got out of line to go to the pickup parking spot to download the app and order. As we are ordering workers were outside smoking and staring at my car. Once we put the order in for pick up we went through the drive thru once again and was greeted with the same lady who sounds like she hates her life. Then proceeded to say that EVERYTHING we ordered, they were out of. Can't believe these tub of shit workers want 15 an hour but don't feel like making any food an hour before they close Fire them all, close down the McDonald's, and sell the building fr

This location is garbage!!! I ordered a chicken sandwich and fries were ice cold and tasted like they've been sitting out for days. The chicken sandwich was dry and burnt. The amount of mayonnaise they put on this sandwich was a joke, see the photo for evidence. I get that it's McDonald's and to not have too high of standards but come on, this is just beyond ridiculous. You have to literally try to ruin it this bad!
Fuck this place I order on DoorDash send me a whole different order with the receipt with my order with some busted open fucking dipping sauce hope this bitch burns down

This is the worst McDonald's I have ever been to. The older Indian worker is terribly rude. We paid for extra sauce, as they are very strict on sauces provided (which I understand). However, we were not given any sauces with our order. When we waited to tell him, he was snarky and mentioned we needed to pay for our sauces. I noted, politely, that we did in fact pay and he asked for the receipt, immediately walking away when I turned to get it. When I provided it, he didn't even look. 
Additionally, he forgot a drink and when I asked for it he told me I only ordered two, which wasn't true. As mentioned, we provided the receipt and he gave it to us, but was very rude. 
This has happened every time I've been here. I have never had a pleasant experience with him. 
I would literally drive 20 minutes just to avoid this man.

So I was an employee at the restaurant and I have two kids of my own so they they deactivated my account because I haven't shown up to work in a while but you don't pick up the phone when I called this please do take forever the employees talk too much they talk to each other they don't know what to do with themselves they talked with a bad attitude like I'm mad because they deactivated my account and most likely I'm fired if I go in so they're terrible and then a review I give you 0 Stars

The manager that was there yesterday afternoon couldn't handle the lunch crowd. They kept messing up the orders the man in line was waiting on his food to be remade for about 30 minutes.. I was waiting for a refill on sweet tea for about 20 minutes.two girls came up to me one said it's not made and walked away. The other one said it's not brewing and walked away. The manager finally came over to me and asked me what I wanted and went to the back and got me a sweet tea. I don't under stand why the other two girls couldn't bring up the sweet tea or made sure there was another brewing instead of staring at the screen. There was a lot of orders waiting on sweet tea. Very unorganized

I would rather suck on stranger toes then EVER RETURN to this piss hole!! They actually had the nerve to say they open the restaurant on "SLIDING SCALE"  I'm dead!!!! This is not the first time I've had similar experiences here. Plus... like let's get real.... McDonald's is literally the bottom of the barrel when it comes to food options these days. I mean, sharing kibble with my Frenchie is a degree higher! Lol

tried to go through the 24/7 driver through and when employee saw us, they ran to the back to hide. We haven't been greeted or served at all.
12/30/2021. you need to hire better night staff.

Waited for an hour - no exaggeration here - in the drive thru line (maybe 6 cars ahead of me in line.)  When we finally got the food the order was wrong.  They said they would fix it but after sitting in the parking lot for another 15 minutes we left.  The lady who took our order was nice but everyone else was either totally unresponsive or rude.

Please be sure you drive before visiting.  The management tends to lock the dining room when short staffed, denying walk in customers.  After an 1130 AM visit, they almost refused to wait on me.   Drive thru customers take priority.

Horrible service all the time. The sodas are almost always flat. The coke at this location taste terrible. They don't honor the app coupons at this location. Spend the extra few bucks to drive to a different location you will thank me

I've stopped at this McDonald's a couple of times. I'm not one to fault service from one bad experience, but now I've had my second. Not only is the end dining unavailable but they've locked the doors so when you have something wrong with your order through the drive-through you have to wait and go all the way around the drive-thru again. Try doing that at lunchtime.  I did have one other opportunity to Donna at this location only to find at 11:45 PM it was closed.

TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE --I will not return. The manager would not give me the order that I paid for at the drive through. She kept insisting that I ordered something else and paid a different total.  She argued and instead of offering to retake my order, she insisted that I pull forward and wait for a refund. I pulled forward and waited and finally left without my food or a refund. Once at work I checked online and saw that I did pay for what I did order but never received the food or a refund. I called for a refund but was told that she could not do that over the phone. I was told that I would have to return to the store for a gift card instead.  While she was on the phone with me she was constantly talking in Spanish to someone with her. Since my office is nearby my coworkers and I used to drive through frequently. I will not be patronizing this store while under the current management that does not understand how to give good customer service.

Ordered at drive through this morning and the rude manager with poor English skills argued that I ordered and paid for a much cheaper order. I returned the food to her since it was not my order. She kept insisting that I ordered 2 sausage burritos and only paid for that but I ordered ice tea, oatmeal and a hash brown and was charged 6.28 on my debit card. She refused to give me what I ordered. After She argued for awhile she insisted that I drive forward and wait for a refund. I waited for awhile then drove off without my breakfast or a refund -no chance to get what I ordered for breakfast once I got to work I saw online that I did indeed pay $6.28 no apologies were ever given I called but she kept talking Spanish to other people while she was on the phone to me. She told me that she had no way to refund my debit card and that I would need to return to the store for a refund. Not worth the aggravation for breakfast and a big waste of my time. Myself and many other in my office used to pick up food from this McDonalds. Those days are over with the current management in place...

Nope. How difficult is it to get an order of one Big Max and one Filet of Fish and a bottled water correct? 

Three standard items. This is easy. 

But not here. Too complicated.
Y'all should close the location up and save money fr fr  like all jokes aside I waited 30 mins for no reason it's sad I get u may be short staffed but close the store down and save money
I'm glad my daughter didn't go into labor while here. She would have had the baby before we got out of the line. The wait is awful, rude employees and horrible food.
I didn't know I had to specify that I wanted a large order of fries and not just a large fry box.

Would give it a 0 if it was possible i don't know what it is about this location but every single fucking time my orders fucked up 2 mcdoubles no mustard no onion and a large fry isn't a big ask yet somehow they manage to have soggy fries every single time

I waited over 40 minutes for a mobile order. Employee came to my car with incorrect order. After a while I came to the window and they said they were not able to fulfill my order completely. I asked for something of equal value. They did not give me anything close to equal value and refused to refund what they couldn't fulfill.  After that I asked to speak to a manager and the employee close the window on me and did not come back. Altogether I was waiting outside for 50 minutes. This is completely and utterly ridiculous in every way. This is not the first time Ive had an issue with this McDonalds. 
12/28/21 between 6 and 7pm
Don't like the rude attitude I get from the lady with the dreads or long braids, like calm your tone
I'm pretty sure this is NOT a sausage McMuffin with egg!!  Everybody makes mistakes, but DON'T get an attitude with the customer when they (we) point it out!

If I could give 0 stars I would in a heartbeat. I ordered 2 burgers only ketchup and was given to Big Macs with everything but ketchup on them. I don't understand how hard it is to make a burger with LITERALLY ONLY KETCHUP. AND I WAS GIVEN 2 small/ medium fries. I barley eat fast food and this is one of the reasons why. CANT BELIEVE IT. If someone from management could reach out to me I'd like a refund. Figuring you guys wouldn't mess up such a simple order I didn't ask for a receipt. My order was placed this morning around 1:15AM. My  order was supposed to be ( 10 piece nuggets, 2 double cheeseburgers only ketchup, large fry and a medium fry). Total was around $18 and some change. THANKS!!!

Insanely slow and don't answer when you pull up to order for a few solid minutes. I waited 15 minutes for one egg McMuffin and a coffee, and that's not even too long a wait at this location, believe it or not. Get your s*** together

This McDonald's baffles me. My office is just a block away, so it's right on my way into work. Over the past six months, I've stopped at the drive through maybe 4-5 times, and tried to walk in once, all around 845am. Every single time I've been told that I wouldn't be able to order. I've been told a different reason why every time - not open (says 24 hours? It's 845am on a Weekday?), payment processor not working, door dash only, no food right now, etc. It's just wild, most McDonald's are pretty on point, but this one just baffles me. Do you not want me to pay your business for the goods you purport to sell? What's going on!? Lol.

Came in at 9:40pm, which was 20 minutes before closing. I get that it's near closing, but my order was small and was 20 whole minutes before closing. This man (I'm guessing he's the manager) gavee the rudest look when he let me in the store. And then when I was leaving, he yelled something in foreign language. I'm guessing he cursed me out or said something rude. Whoever is the manager needs to get fired or needs some disciplinary action because he should not treat the customer like that. NEVER coming to this store again as long as he works there.

The young night girls are rude for absolutely no reason. It's McDonald's, so I'm not expecting 5 star service, but there's no reason why I should feel like I'm being yelled at every time I come here after 9 pm. The day shift employees have been absolutely lovely though, so I usually just try to avoid late night dinners here.
It's just bad... that's all I have to say to describe this place. The service, terrible. The food, sub par. I once ordered a Big Mac and I just got the bun, couldn't make it up if I tried.

Ordered food on the McDonald's app for carry out,  they locked the doors with people inside eating and wouldn't open them and wouldn't even come to the door. Couldn't pick up my food because the drive thru line was around the building. Save the trip and go to a different food chain. PS they also said they couldn't cancel my order so I lost $10.

Went in for an online order pick up. When I got there they had not even started the order yet even though they'd had plenty of time to get it going. Waited another 15 minutes while watching the kitchen staff yell at each other like a bickering family and moving a slow as can be, before finally producing the food I was picking up. A ridiculous experience, if I had not been going in to pick up an order for someone else I would not have gone in at all, and will never go in for myself. I don't know who's in charge of that McDonald's but you guys gotta step up your game because you're getting quite a bit of one star reviews and it's not gonna help your location thrive. Either way I'm never coming back for any reason.

The worst McDonald's I've ever been to. We placed a mobile order and had the receipt. They said they didn't have it, wouldn't even look at the receipt or check our order number/code. Manager was absolutely no help. Why bother having one? Staff is very rude. This place is a joke. Won't step foot in here again.

The food was dry and missing all of the flavor. I'd have to say that I caught them on a bad day because I've never gotten food this bad from them before. I have no pictures because after the first bite, I tossed it in the trash. I've been to a good McDonald's before and this wasn't it.

I stopped this morning to get a biscuit and gravy and nobody came to the speaker to take my order and I hollered 3 times hello is anybody working and nobody answered me. I don't know if I will stop there again, but I know somebody knew there was a car waiting to order and I guess they just didn't want to answer me or take my order.

The customer service is horrible & the staff was extremely rude. They also ran out of regular buns & went to the Dollar Store to buy the CHEAPEST buns to replace the ones they were out of. Crunchy & disgusting.

Poor customer service , I get it's Christmas but no one should have to wait over ten minutes in front of the ordering machine. When there's no one ahead of us and the dinner hall is practically empty. The line to begin with was long and slow. We on numerous occasions asked if some was there. No reply.    You can hear us and see us but yet ignore your customers. Once again I understand the circumstances but customer service goes a long way.

Would rate ZERO stars if i could, workers are ignorant and dumb. That's even if they answer the drive through window past 10pm. Supposedly 24/7 but yet they just started at you and don't answer the drive thru. Prime example why 15/hr is a ridiculous concept.

They have signs all around the building that say the drive through is open until Midnight Thursday, Friday, and Saturday. Then in teeny little letters on the drive through window it says closed Christmas Day. There was a line for the drive through.
Ok this McDonald's is the worst ever. I've never been so angry sitting in a drive through line. How long!! My goodness!! Like why is it taking forever
The customer service is disappointing at best. They also dont seem to know how mobile orders work.

Worst drive thru experience of my life. Waited 30 min behind one car to get to the order screen only to have someone tell me they will be right with me and take 4 other cars and 15 min while I sit at the ordering screen. I should've looked at the reviews before I went to this place but let this be a warning to anyone interested.
This is the third time this place didn't put salt on their fires. It's an absolute travesty!!!!
Worst service ever. Everyone working there is socializing and goofing around. No interest in taking or filling orders. Late night drive thru is the absolute worst. Slow and unfriendly.
The worst service, food tasted unfresh and the drinks werent even filled. I feel duped with the food service and customer service.

Made order for pick up to avoid the long drive through lines.   Not yo long it. Wait. Arrived home  to find my entire order a mess  yet it was a very simple order 
2 spicy chickens.  Large fry  Frappuccino 

The  chicken sandwiches  hand nothing on them only a chicken patty. An bun. The fry was a Small fry an was ice cold an the Frappuccino was half full 

Not sure why this place is still in business at this point. Attempted to call back the phone is busy  seems like it's off the hook so no one can call the business 
Pretty crappy night.   Can a store manger please give me a call
Never had a McDonald's charge for sauces before. Should've stopped somewhere else and it's too early for the food to not taste fresh.

I will say the customer service is nice and the employees are kind, but they DO NOT care about you after you leave the window. I've went the last two times and my order was wrong. Last time I ordered four chocolate chip cookies and got two apple pies and then today my chicken sandwich was completely plain (which I didn't ask for) and the apple pie seemed to be sitting out for hours- it was dry, crusty and old. I just wouldn't go to this location. Not worth your money.

Tried to dine in at 9:50pm and the door was locked. People were inside eating and the hours on the door said open until 11:00. A women came to the door and then asked her coworker and then they obviously just made up that the registers inside were not working. Seemed weird because I saw the people inside ordering as I walked up. Just another case of employees not caring if where they work makes money. Maybe I looked like I was gonna hang out for over an hour but I was really just grabbing something and walking back to my hotel. Thanks a lot! I hope the owner sees this and realizes how much beach foot traffic money they are missing out on by hiring buttholes.

i'm ashamed that i even had to write a review and that i couldn't rate 0 starts because oh my god. absolutely awful. service sucks, food was undercooked, and don't get me started on that girl with the red box braids. i've never seen that girl in my whole life but she talked to me like we had beef. ALL of the front service girls were on something because they all had an attitude! i also heard the red haired girl say something about me and she literally tossed the bag at me! i know the stress of working at mcdonald's but this was beyond words. i worked there for over a year and the ones that i worked at were horrible but i'm surprised this one was worse. oh and to add, the girl wanted to argue with me over my order even though the receipt CLEARLY SHOWED that i had gotten another fry and she wouldn't give it to me without paying. ADN she harassed my friend by laughing at him saying hello. never coming back. ever. absolutely disgusting people, food, and attitudes. i'm literally a teenager with a different attitude but this was worse than i have ever been.
Trash service. After waiting for 20 mins in drive through line, got to the window and was told they were closed.
This is the worst McDonald's to literally ever exist, lazy pieces of trash work here idk who is management but fix it cuz wtf lazy mfs

2nd worst McDonald's experience in the world. 

Often order a happy meal for the kiddo and they usually are missing an item of food weather it be the apple slices, milk, and yes, if you can believe it the nuggets were once missing.  

Have submitted complaints through McDonald's.   But beware.

Definitely the worst McDonald's expire NcE I have had in the world.  They often leave things out of orders.   Have even submitted complaints through McDonald's online for this location.   I have noted on several occasions that they take the card at the front window and keep it for longer periods and they walk away with it.   I recently experienced CC fraud and I suspect (cannot prove) that this location may be the culprit, as my card was used directly across the street (and online) to rack up charges.  

If you have to go here use cash and check your order.

this place is the worth establishment i have been to in the year 2021. the customer service is TERRIBLE. by far my worth fine dining experience of 2021. we were denied food for our large family because it was taking too long to order, too long meaning 3 minutes tops when we waited in line for 10 minutes. 
if i could rate it a 0 i would

actual garbage. every single time i have to come here they mess up almost everything. i am so nice to them and they are rude asf and one of them called me a bitch because i asked for fries and a drink. apparently that was too much for them. probably better off going to the one on pendleton pike. trust me when i say u will be back in line because something will be messed up. and they will 1000% be disrespectful even if they messed it up. if i could give 0 stars i would.
This is the worst location you can ever go to. The employees are lazy and I understand you are understaffed but to not even attempt to do your job is ridiculous. If I could give you a -5 I would

Usually I'm not one to write reviews whatsoever, but this McDonald's took a lot for me to actually write one. First off, the employees of this place are absolutely so rude for no reason? The women of this place, oh dear lord (especially the younger ones) have an attitude the entire time you're ordering. I could literally hear them sighing over the microphone while ordering food. It's not my fault that you guys have to work here at night time - God forbid I am hungry. I absolutely hate this place, I will drive down to Valencia to get McDonald's from now on. I know those people are actually nice and don't complain about getting a simple job done. This whole McDonald's needs a whole new team to be honest. The gentleman, however I've never had a single problem with. They are very nice and helpful as well. Please don't think that I am being sexist, but this is what it has come down to. So  unprofessional, these people need to find other jobs where they don't have to deal with people because clearly they weren't taught the basic rules of customer satisfaction. - Good luck.

im disappointed but not surprised with the sh*tty service i received here tonight. they refused to  acknowledge me at the mic after five minutes and saying hello i was still ignored. i pull up to the window where i can physically see workers passing by and ignoring me. i was actually making eye contact with one at the window for a good 5 more minutes and still no greeting or service. as two cars pull up behind me im growing impatient and decide to turn around through the drive thru again and i see the other cars being helped and out by the time im pulling back in. lazy f*cking incompetent workers at this location.
It's open 24/7 yet everytime I get off work for some reason the system is always down I don't think the workers want to work , no way in hell the system is down everytime . Just crazy !
Every single time, literally every time I go to this McDonald's after 11 pm they say they are no longer taking orders or just closed when they claim to be open 24 hours.

Showed up at 7:45PM and the doors were locked. No signage present to notify anyone that there was a chance to the lobby hours. Several people were observed inside to include ordering food. Eventually one customer came to let another customer out and informed us that the lobby was closed. Then proceeded to lock the door on us. If the lobby doors are locked why is there not an employee there to open the doors. Additionally the website stated that this location was open from 5:00 AM to 10:00PM. Sure would have been nice to have some form of notification!

One of the worst services I had ever experienced in my life. I sat at the drive through for 15 minutes waiting to place an order another vehicle came they took care of that car and when I went inside to talk to a manager she was rude and refused to take my order. They are the worst I've ever come across through.
Come here everyday n lunch because this is the only place by my job. Ask for cooked to order food and they get it correct 20% of the time.

The employees here are the rudest people I've ever encountered. If you hate your job so much find another one and stop making it a horrible experience for the paying customers. Always a bad experience at this location always!! Try to give the benefit of the doubt but no more they will never change and the management is the worst ones to deal with that just shows you nothing will change. Spend your hard earned money somewhere else!!

WHY DO I BOTHER???
I
Today may have been the last straw for me and this location. Even before COVID, it was very often food would be missing from our orders. But now with often times the store being closed during posted open hours, the often one lane closed for drive through, the poorly congested entrance (especially I when one lane is closed), still food missing from order requiring another 20 minute wait in the drive thru to get missing items, and this morning waiting 20 minutes in the drive thru to get breakfast to be told now serving lunch and then waiting another 10 minutes to leave after saying no thank you...just probably going to go to any other McDonald's than this location. Recommend doing the same since frequent survey results and complaints to this location seem to fall on deaf ears.
